description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft ODBC Driver remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-26162):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates from the links provided below based on your operating system version.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This series of updates resolves several vulnerabilities impacting the Microsoft ODBC Driver, enhancing security against potential remote code execution attacks.
- Download packages for the relevant updates can be found at the following links:
  - [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
  - [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
  - [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
  - [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is on one of the affected builds listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
